          <title>
            <string language="en">Aluminium and oxide ions in electrolysis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aluminium- und Oxidionen in der Elektrolyse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ions d'aluminium et d'oxyde dans l'électrolyse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Íons do alumínio e do óxido no electrolysis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ioni dell'ossido e dell'alluminio 
nell'elettrolisi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιόντα αλουμινίου και οξειδίων στην ηλεκτρόλυση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Iones del aluminio y del óxido en electrólisis</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows aluminium and oxide ions present in molten aluminium oxide while undergoing electrolysis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aluminium oxides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrolysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxides</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Aluminium- und 
Oxidionen, die im flüssigen Aluminiumoxyd beim Durchmachen von von 
Elektrolyse vorhanden sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des ions d'aluminium et
d'oxyde actuels en oxyde d'aluminium fondu tout en subissant 
l'électrolyse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os íons do alumínio e 
do óxido atuais no óxido de alumínio derretido ao submeter-se ao 
electrolysis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli ioni dell'ossido 
e dell'alluminio presenti in ossido di alluminio fuso mentre subisce 
l'elettrolisi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ιόντα αλουμινίου και 
οξειδίων παρόντα στο λειωμένο οξείδιο αλουμινίου στην 
ηλεκτρόλυση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los iones del aluminio 
y del óxido presentes en óxido de aluminio fundido mientras que 
experimenta electrólisis.</string>
          </description>
